Package me.yleoft.zAPI.command

Interface SubCommand

All Superinterfaces:
CommandBasis, org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter
public interface SubCommand extends CommandBasis
Represents a sub-command in a command structure. Sub-commands are typically used to handle specific functionalities under a main command.
